definitions.definition: Constructed with one or more pivoted joints which allow bending of an otherwise rigid structure.
Of a vehicle, composed of component parts each with its own wheels and chassis , e.g. an articulated lorry , articulated bus , or certain kinds of streetcars and trains .

main_definition: Constructed with one or more pivoted joints which allow bending of an otherwise rigid structure.
secondary_definitions: Of a vehicle, composed of component parts each with its own wheels and chassis , e.g. an articulated lorry , articulated bus , or certain kinds of streetcars and trains .
( grammar , linguistics ) Qualified by an article
